about_the_game:
【Plot Overview】

This is a short story set in a post-apocalyptic world. However, the goal is not only to survive in the wilderness.

The teddy bear AI companion, Gill, woke up in the darkness, with its memory still lingering on the day when the little master had just picked it up.
When waking up, the base experienced a power outage.
"I need to find the little master quick. The power is out, I don't know why."
Driven by such awareness, with the help of the administrator AI girl FifteenFour, Gill began to search for the little master's whereabouts within the base.

【Character Information】


【Gameplay Information】

Use the arrow keys to control the character's direction, and use the spacebar or enter key to interact with the environment. Long press the spacebar to speed up the cutscenes. Make sure to look for clues, if you can't find any, try investigating with the help of FifteenFour.
Repair the elevator, go up to the surface, and try to find clues about the little master!

It is a classic exploration puzzle game. The puzzles are simple, with many hints and collectables that do not affect the ending.
We hope you can relax and enjoy this short and heartwarming story!

/ Move / with arrow keys
/ Confirm / using Z, Space, or Enter
/ Cancel / using X or Esc

【Other Information】

Game duration: 30-40 minutes
Number of endings: 2
Design, Story, Art: 拾伍司154
Music: Free-to-use Assets
Developer: FifteenFour154
Publisher: Eternal Dream
Translation: °Know Team

short_description: Waking up in the darkness, unable to see the sunrise, he remembered the little master carefully carried him home. The base has already fallen into ruin and there are no signs of any living people here. Where did the little master go? Is there any hope left under the doomsday?
